title: Titan Fleet: The Invictus
description: Titan The Invictus When a battle for his life brings Pace to the attention of Prime Lady Eve Thorn, the simple engineer is thrust into a world of war and conspiracy. What starts off as a simple space salvage mission for much needed resources soon becomes a mission to save the last human settlement in the galaxy. Can Pace save the crew of The Invictus that have become his family, from an evil alien species hell bent on wiping out the human race? Can he warn the inhabitants of Foloss in time? Will love survive the journey? Is Pace up to the challenge?
author: Jason J. Black
